description:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/2029/

Received this while trying to create an instance.

Looks like 'dns' only gets defined if network_info has a 'dns' key. But the variable is used no matter what.
title: Error injecting networking: unbound local variable 'dns'

comments.content:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/2029/

Received this while trying to create an instance.

Looks like 'dns' only gets defined if network_info has a 'dns' key. But the variable is used no matter what.
